story_26_54000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I was...dreaming? Why would I dream of my past
at a time like this? I’m not a weakling anymore.
story_26_54000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I know that voice... You’re the one who set up this
ridiculous kidnapping!
story_26_54000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Heh heh heh. Starting today, that room is your
very own castle. Hope you enjoy it!
story_26_54000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’ll come pay you a visit once I’m done with all of
my preparations here. Ta-ta for now!
story_26_54000/2401_1001_0800_10: Tsk! Does he think he can get away with this?!
story_26_54000/2401_1001_0900_10: I can’t believe I lost to those fools...
story_26_54000/2401_1001_1000_10: I’m supposed to become the strongest king of all!
